title: Nachos with avocado salsa
description: These cheesy nachos with beef rag첫 and avocado salsa make the best TV snack.
ingredients: Juice of 1 small lime, plus lime wedges to serve
1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
Small handful of fresh coriander, roughly chopped

method.Step 1: Preheat the grill to medium-high. Put the rag첫 into a small pan and heat for 5 minutes or until piping hot.

method.Step 2: Arrange the tortilla chips on 2 heatproof plates or in 2 dishes. Spoon the hot rag첫 on top and sprinkle over the cheese. Grill for 2-3 minutes, until the cheese is melted and turning golden.

method.Step 3: Meanwhile, halve, stone and peel the avocado, then cube. Mix with the other salsa ingredients and season.

method.Step 4: Scatter the avocado salsa over the nachos and serve while hot with the lime wedges, if you like.
